page.title: 19Fashion in Wash Common
page.content: We are doing a survey in Wash Common to find the result of a list of questions we have asked various age groups about the type of clothes people would wear for casual, special occasions and parties or disco. We have also been talking to people about hte colours they wear. We have interveiwed 5-6 year olds and 8-9 year olds. They like wearing T-shirts with skirts or shorts. The favourite colours are blue, green and red for the boys and white, pink, yellow and green for the girls. The 15 year olds we found, liked to wear baggy trousers and big shirts, skirts and shorts. The colours they preferred to wear this year were pastel colours like white, pale blue and pale green. Some liked heavier colours like black.
